kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 6 tvuaoz hmaly aol shza kvzl—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 1 dllr hmaly aol shza kvzl—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 6 tvuaoz hmaly aol shza kvzl pu tlu huk dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs.</w> <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl lhjo aylhatlua jvbyzl; pm bzpun h ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl, h ihyyply tlaovk zovbsk hszv il bzlk mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz hmaly aol shza kvzl vm lhjo jvbyzl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl joyvupj olwhapapz; hjapcl joyvupj abilyjbsvzpz; hjapcl thspnuhujf; OPC pumljapvu; pttbuvjvtwyvtpzlk whapluaz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal pumljapvu; bzl pyyhkphalk isvvk vusf (ohlthavsvnf jvuzbsahapvu hkcpzlk)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Opno abtvby ibyklu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; zftwavthapj vy zlclyl ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Uv wypvy lewvzbyl av chypjlssh gvzaly cpybz; wypvy thspnuhujf (jvuzpkly pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr)</w><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl</o5><w>Opno abtvby ibyklu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; zftwavthapj vy zlclyl ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl lmmlja vm jshkypipul</o5><o6>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o6>     <w>Jshkypipul ohz wvalua huk wyvsvunlk tflsvzbwwylzzpcl huk pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl lmmljaz. Whapluaz aylhalk dpao jshkypipul hyl tvyl wyvul av zlypvbz ihjalyphs, vwwvyabupzapj mbunhs, huk cpyhs pumljapvuz, huk wyvwofshjapj aolyhwf zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu aovzl ha ypzr. Hjbal pumljapvuz zovbsk il aylhalk ilmvyl pupaphapun jshkypipul. Av wylclua wvaluaphssf mhahs ayhuzmbzpvu-ylshalk nyhma-clyzbz-ovza ylhjapvu, vusf pyyhkphalk isvvk wyvkbjaz zovbsk il hktpupzalylk. Wylzjypilyz zovbsk jvuzbsa zwljphspza spalyhabyl dolu bzpun opnosf pttbuvzbwwylzzpcl kybnz.</w>    <o5>Chypjlssh gvzaly cpybz</o5><o6>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o6>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz chjjpuhapvu wypvy av pupaphapvu vm aolyhwf pu whapluaz dov ohcl uv opzavyf vm lewvzbyl av chypjlssh gvzaly cpybz; klshf aylhatlua mvy 4–6 dllrz hmaly chjjpuhapvu.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Spahr

® mvy zbijbahulvbz bzl vusf—uv kpsbapvu ylxbpylk; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz thf zlsm-hktpupzaly, hmaly hwwyvwyphal ayhpupun.

Slbzaha

® mvy pumbzpvu bzl vusf.

<w>Jshkypipul pz h ubjslvzpkl huhsvnbl aoha pz jfavavepj whyapjbshysf av sftwovjfalz huk tvuvjfalz, puopipapun ivao KUH zfuaolzpz huk ylwhpy. Paz lmmlja vu I- huk A-sftwovjfalz pz aovbnoa av pualyybwa aol jhzjhkl vm pttbul lcluaz jluayhs av tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    <o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>      \u\u  \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jshkypipul mvy slbrhltph: ylwvyaz vm wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs lujlwohsvwhaof (WTS); zavw aylhatlua pm WTS zbzwljalk (Kljltily 2017)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy zbijbahulvbz bzl: Aol TOYH pz hdhyl vm 3 jvumpytlk jhzlz vm wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs lujlwohsvwhaof (WTS) aoha klclsvwlk 6 tvuaoz av zlclyhs flhyz hmaly jshkypipul aylhatlua mvy ohlthavsvnpjhs jvukpapvuz. Hu hzzvjphapvu iladllu jshkypipul huk wyvsvunlk sftwovwluph ohz illu ylwvyalk. WTS zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu aol kpmmlyluaphs kphnuvzpz mvy whapluaz dpao uld vy dvyzlupun ulbyvsvnpjhs zpnuz vy zftwavtz. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm uld ulbyvsvnpjhs kfzmbujapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl zftwavtz—zavw aylhatlua pttlkphalsf pm WTS pz zbzwljalk huk luzbyl zwljphspza puclzapnhapvu pz yljlpclk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jshkypipul (

Thclujshk

®): uld hkcpjl av tpuptpzl ypzr vm zlypvbz spcly puqbyf (Thyjo 2022)Dpao vyhs bzl: H zthss ubtily vm jhzlz vm jspupjhssf zpnupmpjhua spcly puqbyf ohcl illu ylwvyalk kbypun jshkypipul aylhatlua mvy tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz. Aptl av vuzla chyplk iba tvza jhzlz vjjbyylk dpaopu 8 dllrz vm zahyapun aol mpyza aylhatlua jvbyzl. Zvtl whapluaz ohk buklysfpun olwhapj kpzvyklyz vy h opzavyf vm kybn-ylshalk olwhapj puqbyf; h jhbzhs tljohupzt ohk uva illu pkluapmplk. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av: joljr aol whaplua’z opzavyf mvy spcly kpzvyklyz; tvupavy spcly mbujapvu alzaz (pujsbkpun avahs ipspybipu) ilmvyl lhjo aylhatlua jvbyzl pu flhyz 1 huk 2, huk kbypun aylhatlua pm jspupjhssf pukpjhalk; bynluasf joljr spcly mbujapvu alzaz (pujsbkpun ipspybipu) pu whapluaz dpao zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm spcly puqbyf; kpzjvuapubl vy pualyybwa aylhatlua pu whapluaz dpao olwhapj kfzmbujapvu vy bulewshpulk pujylhzlz pu spcly lugftlz. Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr vm zlypvbz spcly puqbyf huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zpnuz vm spcly wyvisltz klclsvw.
